ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bertoxx Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Aye Musiker is on occasionally. Convinced him to do some soloing in Dreadlands. Last I saw, he was 40. I tried some hunting in the Emerald Jungle. Easy to
ygData.messageBody:
Aye Musiker is on occasionally. Convinced him to do some soloing in
Dreadlands. Last I saw, he was 40.

I tried some hunting in the Emerald Jungle. Easy to fear/chain the iksars.
Was funny, I tried to charm them and after the 4th failure remembered that
they can't be charmed. :-)

Can't say the loot has been to great, but not many people in the zone so
the lag isn't too bad.

Windleaf
Happily sitting at his 40th song, in no rush to 50. :-)

At 10:34 AM 10/13/00 -0400, Gordon Hughes wrote:
>Musiker! I haven't seen you on recently. No, you don't know me, but I
>'spy' on my fellow Bards on Bertoxx, just to see if there's been any
>attrition from nerfs, announcements etc.
>
>I usually do a quick /who all bard to see who's on. More for a boost in
>self-esteem than anything else. I actually like to see high level Bards.
>It gives me something to aim for.
>
>I saw Lago when I was in EC last night. There's just too few of us about.
>
>Kyrisha - 32 songs... learning 33 tonight.
>
>
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
